nodes.text: Giju sliders were the largest of the standard sliders on the menu at Dex's Diner on the planet Coruscant. They were inspired by the planet Giju and the large size of its native species, the Herglic. It consisted of two Bongo beefhead patties, triple cheese, deep-fried Tapani triangles, mega-leaf lettuce, a slice of algae-bread, Boontaspiced mustard, plankton spread, larded neutrinos and a fried blubberbird egg, all on a trans-shipped medium-density food-board, with a green jumbolive on top. It cost 7.7 credits.
